divs: Sighting DetailsDriving on a country road west of Ft Scott, Ks. late eve-stopped at stop sign-this big thing ( it was so bright I couldn`t see the shape) with blinding lights stopped in front of us about 30 ft. in the air -it hovered there for a few seconds, for a bit I couldn`t do anything-I seemed frozen. And then just went up in the air and was gone in a split second. It made no sound. I was so scared, my 12 year old daughter was sreaming for me to go home-I turned the truck around and headed home as fast as we could go. There was also a white pickup that pulled up to the intersection at the same time but they didn`t stop-just threw gravel and drove like crazy to get out of there. when I got home and walked in the door-my husband said I was white as a sheet. Very few people know about this-but I still get chills thinking sbout it.
Summary: lights so bright they almost blinded us-stood still about 50 ft in sky
